com.blip.dao
Interface DAOResource

All Known Implementing Classes:
DAOResourceImpl
public interface DAOResource

Interface of services that must be implemented in DAO scope. This is apart of the API implementation but how I thought that the communication with my API and DAO is with REST services I created this interface to show to other team what services I'm using. I builded this part to test my REST server too.

Author:
leomarques
